alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 11:12PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT TUCKER AND SOUTHEASTERN PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM EDT... At 1112 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Parsons, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Parsons, Davis, Thomas, Hendricks, Hambleton, Hannahsville, Elgon, Benbush, Elk, Lead Mine, Pifer Moutain, and Canaan Valley State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for northeastern West Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker
